name: buddy-extension
description: AI assistant Chrome extension for intelligent content interaction

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:ts: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/background/service-worker-standalone.ts --outfile=dist/src/background/service-worker-standalone.js --target=browser --format=iife && bun build src/content/buddy-standalone.ts --outfile=dist/src/content/buddy-standalone.js --target=browser --format=iife
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/src && cp -r src/content/buddy.css dist/src/content/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/src/assets/icons
scripts.build:watch: bun run build && bun --watch src/**/*.ts run build:ts
